channel.title: Projects on Smile @rT's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Smile @rT's personal blog

item.title: mac-say 💬
item.description: Ruby wrapper around the modern version of the macOS say command. Inspired by the @bratta’s mactts [link]

item.title: vim.min
item.description: Just execute this source <(curl -Ls http://bit.ly/vim-min) on any bare or unfamiliar server, and Bob’s your uncle – an opinionated minimalistic vim setup! [link]

item.title: CLI Ruby Regex Tester
item.description: ’Interactive’ / offline / CLI / Ruby Regexp tester as an alternative to rubular.com [link]

item.title: OMG (my .files)
item.description: OMG (just a nice name for my dotfiles) [link]

item.title: slowtail 🐕
item.description: A little tool to slow the tail :) [link]

item.title: british 🇬🇧
item.description: A tiny module which is supposed to help Brits to use Ruby with more comfort. [link]

item.title: BlazeCards 📇
item.description: A CLI tool which provides you an interface for translating words and generating flash cards decks to learn them with apps like FCD [link]

item.title: PWSQR
item.description: Simple QR interface to pws gem. Helps to use your passwords on a smartphone. [link]
